description:
Using Nova Folsom as of this morning... I'm seeing the following stack trace when trying to boot instances under XenServer:

Build error: ['Traceback (most recent call last):
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 526, in _run_instance
    injected_files, admin_password)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 768, in _spawn
    self._legacy_nw_info(network_info), block_device_info)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/driver.py", line 178, in spawn
    block_device_info)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 349, in spawn
    undo_mgr.rollback_and_reraise(msg=msg, instance=instance)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 1270, in rollback_and_reraise
    self._rollback()
', '  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
    self.gen.next()
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 341, in spawn
    vm_ref = create_vm_step(undo_mgr, vdis, kernel_file, ramdisk_file)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 136, in inner
    rv = f(*args, **kwargs)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 295, in create_vm_step
    rescue=rescue)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 401, in _create_vm
    self.inject_instance_metadata(instance, vm_ref)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 861, in inject_instance_metadata
    store_meta('vm-data/user-metadata', instance['metadata'])
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 855, in store_meta
    key = self._sanitize_xenstore_key(item.key)
', "AttributeError: 'dict' object has no attribute 'key'
"]
title: booting instance w/ metadata fails on XenServer

comments.content:
Using Nova Folsom as of this morning... I'm seeing the following stack trace when trying to boot instances under XenServer:

Build error: ['Traceback (most recent call last):
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 526, in _run_instance
    injected_files, admin_password)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/compute/manager.py", line 768, in _spawn
    self._legacy_nw_info(network_info), block_device_info)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/driver.py", line 178, in spawn
    block_device_info)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 349, in spawn
    undo_mgr.rollback_and_reraise(msg=msg, instance=instance)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/utils.py", line 1270, in rollback_and_reraise
    self._rollback()
', '  File "/usr/lib64/python2.7/contextlib.py", line 24, in __exit__
    self.gen.next()
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 341, in spawn
    vm_ref = create_vm_step(undo_mgr, vdis, kernel_file, ramdisk_file)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 136, in inner
    rv = f(*args, **kwargs)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 295, in create_vm_step
    rescue=rescue)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 401, in _create_vm
    self.inject_instance_metadata(instance, vm_ref)
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 861, in inject_instance_metadata
    store_meta('vm-data/user-metadata', instance['metadata'])
', '  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/site-packages/nova/virt/xenapi/vmops.py", line 855, in store_meta
    key = self._sanitize_xenstore_key(item.key)
', "AttributeError: 'dict' object has no attribute 'key'
"]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/10950
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/10950
Committed: http://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/79a2ea2f5f83dc401d089e357bf35dbdfb8be959
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 79a2ea2f5f83dc401d089e357bf35dbdfb8be959
Author: Dan Prince <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 7 08:48:31 2012 -0400

    Update vmops to access metadata as dict.
    
    Updates the inject_instance_metadata in xenapi/vmops.py so
    that it accesses metadata as a dict instead of an object.
    
    This resolves issues causing exceptions when booting instances
    on XenServer.
    
    Fixes LP Bug #1033963
    
    Change-Id: I58810764abd32d9d292f8282b54c126bf1f4de18
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
